name: Vahid Ajimine
tagline: Avid gamer. Dancer. Social programmer. ENTP personality. Love startups and remote work. Coffee shops are my second home.
body:
# Greetings and Salutations
I am a freelance iOS developer, community organizer, and technical consultant. My current focuses are Swift, Javascript, and database design & management. I am working with a small team of local entrepreneurs, developers, designers, and business leaders to grow the tech and startup community on the Big Island of Hawaii. My passion is developing a startup which builds table-top RPG game tools. One such product is a Dungeons & Dragons Dungeon Master tool for web & mobile built with Swift, Xcode and Javascript. My background is in database design, software engineering, using C# in the Visual Studio .NET environment, some IT experience, and private tutoring in CS, Math, and English.
